sentences.sContent: But the KGB, in turn, was deceiving the Englishmen, because it really believed that they were playing a treble game and were all traitors to the Communist cause.
sentences.sContent_eng: But the KGB, in turn, was deceiving the Englishmen, because it really believed that they were playing a treble game and were all traitors to the Communist cause.
sentences.sCn: 但是克格勃实际上以欺骗回报了英国人，因为他们认为，这几个人在玩三重游戏，实际上是共产主义事业的叛徒。

synos.tran: [数]三倍的；最高声部的；三层的；三重的
